channel.title: Zionscape || We've Got It All
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/6iwjlz.png[/img]
[CENTER][B][COLOR="orange"]Zionscape has arrived! We've worked extremely hard to bring the newest and greatest updates. Ranging from new bosses, new minigames to several new training locations and worldwide skilling. This is a powerful source hosted on a powerful dedicated server that's capable of withstanding large amounts of players with zero lag. Our hope to reach the wonderful community we once had, and we intend to do just that, no matter what it takes. We have provided some of the best content around, and we are confident that we are truly the best economy server around. This server has all you need. Give it a try and you'll never never know the meaning of outside again.[/B][/CENTER]
[B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fs7og.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://Zionscape.net/"]Home Page[/URL] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] [URL=http://"http://Zionscapeweb.com/client/webclient.html"]Play Now![/URL] [IMG]http://www.facebook.com/favicon.ico[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.facebook.com/Zionscape/"]Follow Us on Facebook[/URL] [IMG]http://www.youtube.com/favicon.ico[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/officialzionscape/"]Subscribe on YouTube[/URL] [IMG]http://www.twitter.com/favicon.ico[/img] [URL=http://"http://twitter.com/Zionscape/"]Follow Us on Twitter[/URL] [/CENTER][/B]
[B]Some features:[/B]
[LIST=] [*]Fully functional working EP System [*]Several brand new interfaces including teleporting and login. [*]A fun, enjoyable environment. [*]An active community. [*]New Combat hiticons. [*]Outstanding Fullscreen [*]Working Clan Wars [*]Working Quick Prayers [*]Worldwide Skilling [*]All skills trainable and working. [*]Several new bosses such as Bork, Jungle demon, & more. [*]Kalphite Queen morphing [*]Almost All current Runescape items [*]634 Content [*]Pest Control [*]Fight Arena [*]Flawless switching [*]Working Rune essence mining area [*]3 level slayer tower [*]Working bank tabs [*]100% ALL curse prayers [*]Leeches working 100% [*]Working hand cannon w/ special [*]Working xp counter [*]Auto donation system [*]Vote for rewards system [*]Overload's [*]Npc clipping 100% [*]Player clipping 100% [*]Autocast without staff [*]Korasi sword [*]SOL working special attack [*]All dupes patched [*]Memory leak/Deadlocks have been patched [*]Can hold 600 players no lag (tested) [*]Hiscores [*]New agility courses [*]Identical runescape clan chat [*]New bork boss [*]New bandits training area [*]Flawless Switching [*]New client - 150k memory, very light (functions on all OS's) [*]Clan Wars [*]Zombies Minigame [*]Warriors Guild [*]63 Wave Jad [*]Full Godwars Dungeon [*]Mithril Dragons [*]Duel Arena [*]Duel Tournaments [*]Interactive training areas/cities [*]All Doors working! [*]Tutorial system [*]Pk Titles [*]Pvp artifact drops [*]Working private chat (can toggle for offline to everyone, or just non friends etc)
[CENTER]
[COLOR="#FFA500"][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][B][SIZE=3][U]Media[/U][/SIZE][/B][/FONT][/COLOR]
[B]God Wars Dungeon[/B] Full working godwars dungeon with all correct npc's and correct paths to boss chambers. Such as saradomin rocks, bndos doors, zammorak ice bridge, armadyle grapple hook. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/T80O6A4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bAvWbSW.png[/img]
[B]King Black Dragon[/B] [IMG]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/395/tp9x.png[/img]
[B]Ancient Cavern[/B] [IMG]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/4817/2rx6.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EPaF6EX.png[/img]
[B]Dagannoth Kings[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RVMofEi.png[/img]
[B]Corporal Beast[/B] [IMG]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/3742/em0c.png[/img]
[B]Kalphite Queen[/B] [IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/7153/3jjo.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZP3ydl4.png[/img]
[B]Bork[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tqOceTt.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C9FIfGX.png[/img]
[B]Jungle Demon[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yzi7snb.png[/img]
[COLOR="#FF0000"][B][SIZE=2]More bosses in-game such as sea troll queen, barrelchest, tormented demons, [/SIZE][/B][/COLOR] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Minigames][B]Pest Control[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pDvaRdG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/boIiVZt.png[/img]
[B]Duel Arena[/B] [IMG]http://img36.imageshack.us/img36/2383/g404.png[/img] [IMG]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/4503/7nnt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vDGXjn7.png[/img]
[B]Fight Pits[/B] [IMG]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/4440/zhww.png[/img] [IMG]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/6983/juga.png[/img]
[B]Zombies[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RaBu4Ig.png[/img] [IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/2537/4obp.png[/img]
[B]Duel Tournaments[/B] [IMG]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/4055/yiw2.png[/img]
[B]Clan Wars[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZQpC9Ln.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fJ0QP6e.png[/img]
[B]Barrows[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YSwh9rB.png[/img]
[B]Warriors Guild[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vFe1CCD.png[/img][IMG]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/2525/6zkg.png[/img]
[B]Jad[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iXzTOzG.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Training & Interactive Teleporting][B]Interactive Teleporting[/B] [IMG]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/4376/7k6b.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sKkRH0k.png[/img]
[B]New login Interface[/B] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/30451cdcae1f359ba320e7b83ddb4da1.png[/img]
[B]Training[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5avCvQH.png[/img][IMG]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/1299/2dj1.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5VYRdrk.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZbpzWhW.png[/img][IMG]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/3098/qmel.png[/img]
[B]Community[/B] [IMG]http://Zionscape.net/ui/screenshot/600.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5HIde.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=More media] [B]Our tuturial system[/B] [IMG]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/4286/tfz0.png[/img]
[B]Working rune essence mine, removed ess from the shops, helps economy flow easier[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xG5z16w.png[/img]
[B]Working abyss, accessible from the mage of zammy in edgeville wild[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/375BfwX.png[/img]
[B]Fully functionally clan chat with ranks, banning, crowns etc [/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y1jut.png[/img]
[B]Also 100% working wilderness agility course, (gnome works as well)[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PWjaB.png[/img]
[B]Rev's pk area[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Hej1P.png[/img]
[B]Quikprayers[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cV4eB.png[/img]
[B]Fullscreen, also working realizable client[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ows1p.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Zionscape || We've Got It All
item.dc:creator: @Tylers_Pur31 Tylers_Pur3
item.description:
@Tylers_Pur31 wrote:

Went down the first time for some tax issue, then second time paypal kicked me off and had no income and was loosing money, everything’s taken care of now

Won’t be going down.

Read full topic

item.title: Zionscape || We've Got It All
item.dc:creator: @Tylers_Pur31 Tylers_Pur3
item.description:
@Tylers_Pur31 wrote:

[CENTER]

[CENTER][B][COLOR=“orange”]Zionscape has arrived! We’ve worked extremely hard to bring the newest and greatest updates. Ranging from new bosses, new minigames to several new training locations and worldwide skilling. This is a powerful source hosted on a powerful dedicated server that’s capable of withstanding large amounts of players with zero lag. Our hope to reach the wonderful community we once had, and we intend to do just that, no matter what it takes. We have provided some of the best content around, and we are confident that we are truly the best economy server around. This server has all you need. Give it a try and you’ll never never know the meaning of outside again.[/B][/CENTER]

[B]
[URL=http://“http://Zionscape.net/”]Home Page[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://Zionscapeweb.com/client/webclient.html”]Play Now![/URL]
[URL=http://“http://www.facebook.com/Zionscape/”]Follow Us on Facebook[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://www.youtube.com/officialzionscape/”]Subscribe on YouTube[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://twitter.com/Zionscape/”]Follow Us on Twitter[/URL]
[/CENTER][/B]

[B]Some features:[/B]

[LIST=]
[]Fully functional working EP System
[]Several brand new interfaces including teleporting and login.
[]A fun, enjoyable environment.
[]An active community.
[]New Combat hiticons.
[]Outstanding Fullscreen
[]Working Clan Wars
[]Working Quick Prayers
[]Worldwide Skilling
[]All skills trainable and working.
[]Several new bosses such as Bork, Jungle demon, & more.
[]Kalphite Queen morphing
[]Almost All current Runescape items
[]634 Content
[]Pest Control
[]Fight Arena
[]Flawless switching
[]Working Rune essence mining area
[]3 level slayer tower
[]Working bank tabs
[]100% ALL curse prayers
[]Leeches working 100%
[]Working hand cannon w/ special
[]Working xp counter
[]Auto donation system
[]Vote for rewards system
[]Overload’s
[]Npc clipping 100%
[]Player clipping 100%
[]Autocast without staff
[]Korasi sword
[]SOL working special attack
[]All dupes patched
[]Memory leak/Deadlocks have been patched
[]Can hold 600 players no lag (tested)
[]Hiscores
[]New agility courses
[]Identical runescape clan chat
[]New bork boss
[]New bandits training area
[]Flawless Switching
[]New client - 150k memory, very light (functions on all OS’s)
[]Clan Wars
[]Zombies Minigame
[]Warriors Guild
[]63 Wave Jad
[]Full Godwars Dungeon
[]Mithril Dragons
[]Duel Arena
[]Duel Tournaments
[]Interactive training areas/cities
[]All Doors working!
[]Tutorial system
[]Pk Titles
[]Pvp artifact drops
[]Working private chat (can toggle for offline to everyone, or just non friends etc)

[CENTER]

[COLOR="#FFA500"][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][B][SIZE=3][U]Media[/U][/SIZE][/B][/FONT][/COLOR]

[B]God Wars Dungeon[/B]
Full working godwars dungeon with all correct npc’s and correct paths to boss chambers. Such as saradomin rocks, bndos doors, zammorak ice bridge, armadyle grapple hook.

[B]King Black Dragon[/B]

[B]Ancient Cavern[/B]

[B]Corporal Beast[/B]

[COLOR="#FF0000"][B][SIZE=2]More bosses in-game such as sea troll queen, barrelchest, tormented demons, [/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Minigames][B]Pest Control[/B]

[B]Duel Arena[/B]


[B]Fight Pits[/B]

[B]Zombies[/B]

[B]Duel Tournaments[/B]

[B]Clan Wars[/B]

[B]Barrows[/B]

[B]Warriors Guild[/B]

[B]Jad[/B]
[/SPOILER]

[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=More media]
[B]Our tuturial system[/B]

[B]Working rune essence mine, removed ess from the shops, helps economy flow easier[/B]

[B]Working abyss, accessible from the mage of zammy in edgeville wild[/B]

[B]Fully functionally clan chat with ranks, banning, crowns etc [/B]

[B]Also 100% working wilderness agility course, (gnome works as well)[/B]

[B]Rev’s pk area[/B]

[B]Quikprayers[/B]

[B]Fullscreen, also working realizable client[/B]
[/SPOILER]

[/CENTER]
